resources.string: Shows battery level for a device
Set the device to show the battery status for

You may need to connect your device for it to appear for the first time. If you are having trouble making a device appear, try adding the Battery widget to your home screen to force an update and come back.\n\nLong press an old or renamed device to remove it from the list.
Continues to show the last known battery level when the device\'s battery level is not known, either due to being disconnected or not appearing in the Battery widget
